item.title: Breaking AES GCM Part 1
item.description: This is a small two-part series where I will show some attacks and implementation of AES GCM, and why GCM is a good idea. Let’s get started! Why does AES GCM exist? So it seems like AES is a bit complicated. Most people see AES and think - “Great! This can’t be broken”. And sure, it isn’t feasible in any amount of time to get the key from a ciphertext, even when knowing the plaintext.
